history.text: Hello! How are you?
Good, just finished watching Monsters Inc.  Great movie
oh sorry, monster university
Have you seen it yet?
I haven't see it yet, it is the prequel of Monsters Inc?
Yes, where mike and sully learned how to be scare monsters!
Alright, do you know its rating on Rotten Tomatoes?
It's got some decent scores.  Rotten tomatoes only give it a 6.8, but I loved how it stayed true to the movie without redoing any old info
I agree with Cinema Score:  A!
Are you watching the movie now?
Ok, it sounds great! So, you just have watched the movie. What was your favorite scene?
No, I think I might watch it this weekend with my family!
There are just too many too list!  to quote the critics, it's cute, and funny and the animation is really colorful
Awesome, Pixar always delivers great films without any doubt.
might?  you're family will love it if they liked Monster's INC!
I got a kick out of Sully which doesn't study enough and poor mike, just isn't scary enough
I might because my schedule is quite tight, so I always try to save some time to spend it with my family!
Poor Mike, but well he always tried his best and that also counts!
This will be worth the time to spend with them.  Yup!  Mike starts off as just a 7 year old when he wants to be a scarer!
He wants to prove himself, so he makes a wager with Hardscrabble.  Win, scare team is on.  Lose, and he has to join the misfit group.  =(   I won't tell you how it ends!
That sounds like the old little me, when I say I wanted to become a doctor!
That is surely enough! You got convinced to watch it!
Well for monsters, being a scare tech is quite the achievement.  Doctors wouldn't even have electricity without them.
That's awesome!
The movie sells itself!  Is there a finish conversation box on your end?
Yes, being a scarer it is a job with great recognition!
Do you think the prequel was at the same level as Monsters Inc? Or was even better?
I guess just a few more rounds of conversation.  Key scenes include Mike and Sully being expelled!  you know those too.
Fot a prequel it was actually good.  They "stay in tone" but don't hit old topics,  it really does fit
Oh that is quite a plot twist, do they achieve to return after being expelled?
of course, thanks to mike!
He really is the hero of the movie, although he secretly has sully's help all along
That sense of friendship is always nice to see! It makes feel hope in people.
Well, thanks for the conversation, have a great day!
You too, enjoy the moive!
